description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

Any booster you successfully use on yourself or an ally alters the target’s biochemistry to become more like that of a plant or plant creature. The target gains a +2 enhancement bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects, paralysis, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{poison}, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects, unless the effect specifies that it’s effective against plants. This extra benefit to the booster doesn’t affect targets with the plantlike subtype or the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.e6EOlSBooV9JStUR]{plantlike} universal creature rule.
